#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

#define MAX 100000010

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;


long long n,k,q;
long long scrls,scrllen;

ll mmin(ll a,ll b){
    if(a<b) return a;
    return b;
}

ll mmax(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(a>b) return a;
    return b;
}

ll mabs(ll a)
{
    if(a<0) return -a;
    return a;
}

int main()
{
    int cases;
    ll temp,wl,wh,topr;
    scanf("%d",&cases);

    while(cases--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&q);

        int flag=0;
        wl=1;
        wh = wl+k-1;
        topr=1;
        scrls=0;
        scrllen=0;
        //printf("%lld %lld %lld --->\n",wl,wh,k);
        for(int i=0;i<q;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&temp);
            if(flag==0)
            {
                if(temp>=topr && temp<topr+k)
                {
                    //
                }
                else
                {
                    flag=1;
                    wl = temp-k+1;
                    wh = temp;
                }
            }
            else
            {
                if(temp>=wl && temp<= wh+k-1)
                {
                    wl = mmax(wl,temp-k+1);
                    wh = mmin(wh,temp);
                }
                else
                {
                    ll kk;
                    kk=mmin(mabs(wl-topr),mabs(wh-topr));
                    //printf("%lld k %lld wl %lld topr %lld wh\n",kk);
                    scrls+=1;
                    scrllen+=kk;
                    //printf("%lld kkk \n",scrllen);
                    if(mabs(wl-topr) < mabs(wh-topr))
                    {
                        topr = wl;
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        topr = wh;
                    }

                    wl = temp-k+1;
                    wh=temp;
                }
            }

        }

        if(flag==1)
        {
            ll kk;
            scrls+=1;
            kk=mmin(mabs(wl-topr),mabs(wh-topr));
            scrllen += kk;
            printf("%lld %lld\n",scrls,scrllen);
        }
        else
            printf("%lld %lld\n",scrls,scrllen);
    }
    return 0;
}
